name: General CADD Pro Macro File
summary: Learn about .GXM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Several useful macro files are available from the General CADD Pro website.

description: Macro file used by General CADD Pro, a CAD drawing application for Windows; saves a macro that contains a series of instructions that are automated in the software; useful for executing repetitive operations and writing small, custom programs.
